mapper.sql: id, title, audio_play_time, audio_url, comment_count, date_time, share_url, seminar_id
mapper.insert: insert into people_daily (id, title, audio_play_time, audio_url, comment_count, date_time, share_url, content,seminar_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audioPlayTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audioUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shareUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{seminarId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into people_daily
id,
title,
audio_play_time,
audio_url,
comment_count,
date_time,
share_url,

mapper.update:
update people_daily
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audio_play_time = #{audioPlayTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audio_url = #{audioUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comment_count = #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
date_time = #{dateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
share_url = #{shareUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
seminar_id = #{seminarId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update people_daily set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audio_play_time = #{audioPlayTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audio_url = #{audioUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment_count = #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date_time = #{dateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, share_url = #{shareUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, seminar_id = #{seminarId,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update people_daily set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audio_play_time = #{audioPlayTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audio_url = #{audioUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment_count = #{commentCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date_time = #{dateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, share_url = #{shareUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seminar_id = #{seminarId,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM people_daily WHERE seminar_id=#{seminarId} ORDER BY id DESC limit 0,1
SELECT id FROM people_daily WHERE seminar_id=#{seminarId} AND id < #{id} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 0,1
SELECT id FROM people_daily WHERE seminar_id=#{seminarId} AND id > ${id} ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 0,1
